name: De-stable-ization
description:
A mix of breakout, physics destruction and puns.

Made for Ludum Dare 49 - my first.

Controls:

Click to shoot, R to retry, D to destroy shots

Time for you to unstable the landscape!

(ldjam.com) Rate the game here if you want :)
